attributes.action: Reinstate the Queen to enable us to have a Ruling Monarchy
attributes.background: The public have been subjected to incompetency from current MPs over Brexit.  The Monarchy genuinely have the best interests of the UK in their hearts.  Leaving the country in or out of the EU in the hands of current MPs will be of detriment to our future as a Nation.

rejection.details: We're not sure what you mean by "reinstate the Queen".
